title: 试试看
topic: 尝试新事物 / Trying New Things

script.text: 对话一：奶茶店——王崩和小黑 (Boba Shop — Wang Beng and Xiao Hei)
script.en: Dialogue 1: Boba shop -- 王崩 and 小黑.

script.text: 奶茶店。面对面坐着。王崩点了一杯很复杂的，盯着看，表情狐疑。
script.en: Boba shop. Sitting face to face. 王崩 orders something complicated, stares at it, expression suspicious.

script.zh: 你在看你的奶茶像在看合同。
script.en: You're looking at your boba like it's a contract.
The pearls are unevenly distributed.
...just drink it.
Is it good?
...it's fine.
"Fine." Your compliment skills are truly incredible.
There's this place in Taipei called--

script.zh: 用掉了。你的一次机会用掉了。
script.en: Used it. Your one chance is used up.
I wasn't done.

script.zh: 你要说台北的一家奶茶店。算了。
script.en: You were gonna say a boba shop in Taipei. Forget it.
...fine.

script.zh: 你为什么用那个美白霜？
script.en: Why do you use that whitening cream?
...what?

script.zh: 那个霜。脸上的。提亮什么的。为什么？
script.en: That cream. On your face. Brightening or whatever. Why?

script.zh: 因为……中国的审美标准。我太黑了。
script.en: Because... Chinese beauty standards. I'm too dark.
You're not dark.

script.zh: 你说起来容易。你皮肤白。
script.en: Easy for you to say. Your skin is fair.

script.zh: 我是台湾人。一样的太阳。
script.en: I'm Taiwanese. Same sun.
...that's not how skin color works.

script.zh: 我知道。我的意思是——你的皮肤不是问题。标准是问题。
script.en: I know. What I mean is-- your skin isn't the problem. The standard is the problem.

script.zh: 这是你对我说的第二次好话。第一次是外套。
script.en: That's the second nice thing you've said to me. First was the jacket.

script.zh: 我不是在说好话。我在说事实。
script.en: I'm not saying something nice. I'm stating facts.
For you, it's the same thing.

script.text: 对话二：广东菜——矮中和清清 (Cantonese Food — Ai Zhong and Qingqing)
script.en: Dialogue 2: Cantonese food -- 矮中 and 清清.

script.text: 这个星期他们每天都在图书馆学习了。一开始是做作业。现在矮中没有作业也来。
script.en: This week they've studied at the library every day. At first it was for homework. Now 矮中 comes even when there's no homework.

script.zh: 学完了想不想去吃饭？不是火锅。正经吃饭。我找到了一家广东菜，据说很好吃。
script.en: Wanna go eat after we finish? Not hotpot. A real meal. I found this Cantonese place, supposedly amazing.
You found a Cantonese restaurant?

script.zh: 本来是为小黑找的。但她在跟王崩约会了。所以……
script.en: I originally found it for 小黑. But she's on a date with 王崩. So...
So I'm the backup?

script.zh: 不是！我是说——我想带你去。但是如果你说不我就用小黑当借口。
script.en: No! I mean-- I wanted to take you. But if you said no I was gonna use 小黑 as an excuse.
...that's pretty pathetic.
I know.
...fine. Let's go.
...really?
Don't make me say it twice.

script.text: 餐厅。矮中点菜了——用中文，没看英文菜单。清清看着。他的中文在变好。什么时候的事？
script.en: Restaurant. 矮中 orders -- in Chinese, no English menu. 清清 watches. His Chinese is getting better. When did that happen?
Is it good?
Insanely good.

script.zh: 你刚才说好吃到爆了吗？清清——全宇宙最proper的人——刚才用了slang？
script.en: Did you just say 'insanely good'? 清清-- the most proper person in the entire universe-- just used slang?
It's a perfectly valid expression.
You learned that from me!
I didn't--

script.zh: 你肯定是！我教了你slang！这是我最骄傲的moment！
script.en: You definitely did! I taught you slang! This is my proudest moment!
Eat your food, 矮中.
Yes ma'am!

script.text: 从第一天就喜欢了。= Since the first day I've liked you.
script.en: 从第一天就喜欢了 = Since the first day I've liked you.
Ch 19: 试试 (try and see)

script.text: Ch 19: V起来 (when you start doing...)
script.en: Ch 19: V起来 (when you start doing...)

grammarNotes.title: 试试 (try and see)
grammarNotes.body:
试试看吧。= Try and see.
你应该试试穿亮色。= You should try wearing bright colors.

grammarNotes.title: V起来 (when you start doing...)
grammarNotes.body:
说起来容易。= Easy to say / sounds easy.
喝起来像火。= Tastes like fire (when you drink it).
看起来很酷。= Looks cool.

grammarNotes.title: 从来没...过 — have never
grammarNotes.body:
我从来没吃过这个。= I've never eaten this before.
她从来没去过club。= She's never been to a club.
Pattern: 从来没 + verb + 过 = have never done something. Strong emphasis on 'not even once.'
